summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Hanford Street from 36th Avenue Southwest to Belvidere Avenue and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9182 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
